home.title: I am a Fullstack Web Developer based in La Coruña, Spain.
home.description: I am a self-taught developer with a passion for learning new things and solving problems. I am currently working as a freelancer, but I am looking for new opportunities to grow as a developer.

about.description: based in La Coruña, Spain who enjoys building software. Very positive and highly motivated person in building beautiful websites, web and mobile applications with a stronger focus on the frontend technologies.
